range.label: Range
range.tooltip: Range of cells in the format A1:B10

headerRow.label: Header Row
headerRow.tooltip: Specify how many rows are header rows. These will be excluded from the data and assigned as column labels in the data table. If set to Auto, the spreadsheet will guess how many rows are header rows. Note that if all your columns are string data, the spreadsheet might have difficulty determining which rows are header rows without this parameter set to something other than Auto.

refresh.label: Data Refresh Interval
refresh.tooltip: How often to check the spreadsheet for new data.

error.publish: To use this spreadsheet, it needs to be published to the web and made public. Open your file from the link provided below. From the Google Spreadsheet menu, select File > Publish to the web, and then click the Start Publishing button. Next click Share in the top right of the Spreadsheet, select Advanced, and then set Access to Public. Once done, select your file from the Google Drive button again.
error.refresh: The refresh value can be no less than 5 minutes.

common.required-credentials: Rise Vision needs access to your Google account to verify who you are

hours.available: Support hours: Monday to Friday, 8am to 5pm {{timeZone}}, holidays excluded. It is currently {{currentTime}}. Expected response time is {{expectedResponseTime}}.

on-boarding.lead: Subscribe to access telephone, email and remote control, diagnosis, and correction, for  Rise Vision Applications.

on-boarding.details-2: You can expect to hear from us {{nextSupportDay}} at {{nextSupportTime}}.

horizontal.label: Horizontal Scroll
horizontal.tooltip: Enter amount you want clipped from the leftmost portion of the webpage.

vertical.label: Vertical Scroll
vertical.tooltip: Enter amount you want clipped from the topmost portion of the webpage.

zoom.label: Zoom
zoom.tooltip: This will allow you to zoom in/out of a web page. If value is higher than 100% then scrollbars will be disabled.

interactive.label: Interactive
interactive.tooltip: Enable to allow users to interact with webpage.

time.label: Time
time.tooltip: Show local Display time or pick the Time Zone required
